title: Executive Order 8521-Partial Revocation of Executive Order No. 4203 of April 14, 1925
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, c. 421, 36 Stat. 847, as amended by the act of August 24, 1912, c. 369, 37 Stat. 497, Executive Order No. 4203 of April 14, 1925, temporarily withdrawing certain public lands in California and Nevada in aid of the classification contemplated by the act of February 20, 1925, c. 272, 43 Stat. 952, is hereby revoked so far as it affects the following-described land in California:
T. 9 N., R. 13 E., sec. 9, NW¼NW¼, 40 acres.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8521-Partial Revocation of Executive Order No. 4203 of April 14, 1925 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368394
